name: haproxy
description: HAProxy is a high-performance TCP/HTTP load balancer and reverse proxy server designed for high availability and scalability. Commonly used in production to expose microservices and secure backend connections.

features.title: Load Balancing
features.description: Distribute traffic, Multiple algorithms, Health checks. Scale effortlessly

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Certificate management, SNI support, Encryption. Secure connections

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Extremely fast, Low latency, High throughput. Handle millions of requests

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Real-time stats, Detailed metrics, Web dashboard. Full visibility
